import './works.scss' export default function Works() { const [currentSlider, setCurrentSlider] = useState(0); const data = [ { id: '1', icon: './assets/mobile.png', title: 'Web Design', desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vero dolorum cumque deserunt, eos, quaerat, quis odit ", img: 'https://loopup.com/app/uploads/2014/10/The-Rise-of-the-Business-Mobile-App.png' }, { id: '3', icon: './assets/writing.png', title: 'Branding', desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vero dolorum cumque deserunt, eos, quaerat, quis odit ", img: 'https://www.techfunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/benefits_of_branding.jpg.jpg' } ]; return (
